body:
xmlto and libaio come from fedorahosted, which was shut down recently (see #3443).

``` bash
$ spack -k fetch xmlto
==> Warning: You asked for --insecure. Will NOT check SSL certificates.
==> Fetching https://fedorahosted.org/releases/x/m/xmlto/xmlto-0.0.28.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Warning: The contents of
  the archive
   look like HTML.
  The checksum will likely be bad.  If it is, you can use
  'spack clean <package>' to remove the bad archive, then
  fix your internet gateway issue and install again.
==> Error: md5 checksum failed for spack/var/spack/stage/xmlto-0.0.28-ufblxyjfmyray7qizbwsp35yjvtdbcgt/xmlto-0.0.28.tar.gz
Expected a1fefad9d83499a15576768f60f847c6 but got 7668bec561b55df947064376ecbb3efc
$ spack -k fetch libaio
==> Warning: You asked for --insecure. Will NOT check SSL certificates.
==> Fetching https://git.fedorahosted.org/cgit/libaio.git/snapshot/libaio-0.3.110-1.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Warning: The contents of
  the archive
   look like HTML.
  The checksum will likely be bad.  If it is, you can use
  'spack clean <package>' to remove the bad archive, then
  fix your internet gateway issue and install again.
==> Error: md5 checksum failed for spack/var/spack/stage/libaio-0.3.110-1-5jilczsccwwmsldt2gx5c2xse7g5zvlk/libaio-0.3.110-1.tar.gz
Expected eb6b1b435afadb5b80c5dd80984249f6 but got 4e3d06aa49b80ef4eed351b40f564adf
```
title: spack cannot fetch xmlto and libaio
